message.body: Bad taste in men and tansy ......I'm NOT Ryan.......at ALL but if I were free we would make a good couple ....anyway, that's what I think
Yes we're ok. I just want an actual boyfriend and feel pathetic sometimes that I love someone who's not available. (You) And someone else who is do confused (little toes)
Well....speaking for myself.....it's nice to love someone who I also like as a friend
And we can talk about anything and everything.....I had another dream with you in it this weekend which is sooooo rare
Wait did I tell you Krista dreamed about you and me too? A few months ago?
We've got to make time for this soon. The dreams are important. Maybe tomorrow in Les' class we could walk down to the park on a break, if that's enough time and space.
